GameModel

Class Equipable

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Item
      • GameModel.Equipable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Armor, Weapon

    public abstract class Equipable
extends Item
    Equipable is an abstract subclass of Item that a Player can equip which will grant bonuses to the Player's combat statistics
    Author:
    Matthew Latura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Equipable(java.lang.String n, int w, java.lang.String d)
      The default constructor sets the name, weight, and description of the Equipable item using the passed parameters.
      Equipable(java.lang.String n, int w, java.lang.String d, EquipSlot e)
      A more powerful constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Equipable

        public Equipable(java.lang.String n,
         int w,
         java.lang.String d)
        The default constructor sets the name, weight, and description of the Equipable item using the passed parameters. the item will be unequipped and it's equip slot will be HAND
        Parameters:
        n - - The equipable item's name
        w - - The equipable item's weight
        d - - The equipable item's description

      • Equipable

        public Equipable(java.lang.String n,
         int w,
         java.lang.String d,
         EquipSlot e)
        A more powerful constructor. This sets the item's name, weight, description, and equip slot to the passed values. Is equipped is awlays set to false
        Parameters:
        n - - The equipable item's name
        w - - The equipable item's weight
        d - - The equipable item's description
        e - - The equipable item's equip slot
